Articles.Content:
Blast off for an epic adventure of galactic proportions! Choose a side and fight for control of Nexus, while uncovering the secrets of the hyper-advanced Eldan that disappeared from the planet long ago. JUNE 3: $59.99 or $74.99 (Delux) plus monthly subscription.

Edited March 22, 2014 by Lohan2008
this immediately reminded me of spore. looks interesting none the less

Looked remotely interesting when I watched a let's play of it, but reminded me too much of WoW (which I played for a couple years) and the $15 monthly subscription is shameful. I like that you can pay for the subscription by doing well in-game, but MMOs in general follow too much of the same style for too much money. LEGO Universe is a great example: I was super excited for it because I am a huge fan of LEGO, but the $10/month cost was too much.

Hopefully it will do well, since it looks like they put a lot of work into it, but I won't be helping it out because I don't enjoy shelling out $15 each month to play something that quickly gets repetitive.

plus monthly subscription.

It lost me right there. I never want to play a F2P game again unless it's ACTUALYL F2P.
60 dollars down AND 15 per month? Count me the hell out.
